dcterms:creator: J. Socher
A. Perelygin
J. Wu
J. Chuang
C. D. Manning
A. Ng
C. Potts
dcterms:description: The SST-2 dataset is widely used for sentiment analysis and consists of sentences labeled with positive or negative sentiment. In this paper, it is used to evaluate the effectiveness of the proposed geometry-aware adversarial training method.
dcterms:title: SST-2

dcterms:creator: A. L. Maas
R. E. Daly
P. T. Pham
D. Huang
A. Y. Ng
C. Potts
dcterms:description: The IMDb dataset is a collection of movie reviews labeled as positive or negative sentiment. It is utilized in this paper to assess the robustness of the proposed adversarial training methods.
dcterms:title: IMDb
